quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Raquel Welch and Helen Hayes
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, rays, people. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which of the following is not a show that has been hosted by Rachael Ray?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cooking with Rachael

questions.question: In what 1966 movie did Raquel Welch play Loana?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: One Million Years B.C.

questions.question: What is the name of Rachael Rays magazine?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Everyday with Rachael Ray

questions.question: Helen Hayes was a pro-business Republican and a member of this organized religion.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: None of these

questions.question: When this actress died, she left the majority of her significant estate to Helen Hayes. However, Helen Hayes died shortly after her dear friend and most of the two ladies estates were turned over to various charities.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lillian Gish

questions.question: Raquel Welch is the birth name of the popular actress.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: When was actress Raquel Welch born?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: September 5, 1940

questions.question: Did Raquel Welch record the single This Girls Back in Town?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: Playboy magazine named Raquel Welch the Most Desired Woman of this decade.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1970s

questions.question: Name the two actors who co-starred with Raquel Welch in the 1968 western Bandolero!?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jimmy Stewart and Dean Martin

questions.question: Did Raquel Welch play Lt. White on the TV show McHales Navy?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: No

questions.question: Helen Hayes is one of only a few people to do what?

options.text: serve as head of the Republican Committee and the Screen Actors Guild
appear on Carson, Leno, Paar, Tom Snyder and Dick Cavett in their lifetime
win an Emmy, Oscar, Grammy and a Tony in their lifetime.
star in one year in commercials, television sitcoms, movies and the theatre (1977).

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: win an Emmy, Oscar, Grammy and a Tony in their lifetime.

questions.question: What part did Raquel Welch play on the sitcom Sabrina, the Teenage Witch?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: aunt Vesta

questions.question: In what 1966 movie did Raquel Welch wear a scuba diving outfit?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fantastic Voyage

questions.question: Did Raquel Welch appear in an Elvis Presley movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Sammy Davis Jr. and Dad

questions.question: Sammy Davis Jr. played the trumpet and the drums along with everything else he did on stage. He learned to play these instruments from his dad and Will Mastin.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Sammy Davis Jr. was too young to enlist when WWII broke out, but he was drafted later. What going away gift did he receive his from dad and Will ?

options.text: a new pair of tap shoes

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Oprah Winfrey

questions.question: Sammy Davis Jr. made his stage debut at an early age. There were laws against someone Sammys age working professionally, (plus he should have been in school), so to get around this, he was billed as which of the following?

options.text: Little Sam - The Tap Dance Man

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Silent Sam - The Dancing Midget

questions.question: After years of hard work, The Will Mastin Trio - Featuring Sammy Davis Jr., officially made it big. At what famous nightclub did this momentous event occur?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ciros

questions.question: Because Sammy Davis Jr.s education didnt qualify him for any of the armys special schools, they just kept sending him back to basic training over and over.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Will Mastin

options.text: Stop the World - I want to Get off

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mr. Wonderful

questions.question: Sammy Davis Jr. was performing professionally by the age of four.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Rachael Ray has appeared on the popular childrens program, Sesame Street.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In 1958 Sammy Davis Jr. made this film about a woman of ill-repute.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Anna Lucasta

questions.question: Rachael Ray posed  for a mens magazine in 2003.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Rachael Rays first job was at an ice cream shop in New York City.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False
